alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 1:37PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Gulf and south central Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, southwestern Liberty and northwestern Franklin Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 215 PM EDT/115 PM CDT/... At 137 PM EDT/1237 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles east of Stonemill Creek, or 22 miles north of Eastpoint. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Stonemill Creek, Orange, Wewahitchka, Honeyville, Chipola Cutoff, Central City, Red Hill, Kern, Wilma, Lewis, Sumatra, Willis Landing and Dalkeith. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty
